title: New CJ Mohan Peiris takes oaths
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva Former Attorney General and legal advisor to the president, Mohan Peiris was sworn in as the 44th Chief Justice of Sri Lanka a short while ago, the President Media Unit confirmed. He took oaths before President Mahinda Rajapaksa at 12.35 pm today on January 15 at Temple Trees….
